cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Template__c
cgcloud__Job_Definition_List_Template__c.description: Template that controls the behavior of Job definition lists.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Indicates whether the activity template is available for use.

cgcloud__Classification__c.description: Describes the type of activity template that's used to show the cockpit card of mobility device.

cgcloud__Consider_Account__c.description: The attribute is used in activities with standard jobs. If yes, the system considers the Customer of the call when determining the relevant standard activity. If no, the standard activity is valid for all Customers.

cgcloud__Consider_History__c.description: Defines the default configuration for considering historical products during activity creation.

cgcloud__Consider_Listing__c.description: Defines the default configuration for considering listed products during activity creation.

cgcloud__Consider_Products__c.description: Defines the default configuration for individual addition of products to the activity.

cgcloud__Default_Management_Type__c.description: Specifies the default management type that's considered in the user determination when creating job lists from non-standard activity.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Display_In_Cockpit__c.description: Indicates whether the activity template is to be shown in the cockpit (mobility).

cgcloud__Duration__c.description: Defines the default duration when creating an activity (measured in weeks).

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the activity template belongs.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Specifies the sort value of the activity template record.

cgcloud__Standard_Jobs__c.description: Indicates whether standard jobs are to be considered.

cgcloud__User_Policy__c.description: Controls the determination of valid users when the activity is activated. The attribute controls valid users by interpreting the main management relation between the user and the Customer.
